HomeAbout.group: Faculty of Information and Communication Technology
HomeAbout.about_me_subject: Want to know more about {{name}}? This may help you.
HomeAbout.difficult: To get to this point Is it difficult?
HomeAbout.difficult_description: I think it's not that difficult. You just need a little dedication and don't get discouraged easily. But getting started is always difficult. Because no one can be born and write code immediately. So if we're really interested, I recommend starting today.
HomeAbout.personal_subject: personal information about me from time to time
HomeAbout.why: Why did you enter this industry?
HomeAbout.why_description: What attracted me to this industry came from my curiosity. Want to know how it works inside your computer? Where did you start and how did you get it? I thought until I wanted to study computer science. It made me especially interested in it and it led to many projects that I see now.

Home.website_description: Learning and development is just as important as practicing programming and building on it. On this website I will present all of what I will offer
Home.website_subject: {{name}}'s personal website that houses all his projects.

HomeOther.github_description: Unfinished project. in the development Documents for each project details about that project All projects are included here!!
HomeOther.support_description: Want to help or support projects, water, electricity, intellectual property, etc. You can do so through the following steps.
HomeOther.support_thank_you: ❤ Thank you in advance for your continued support

HomeWelcome.subject: Learning and developing is as important as practicing programming and then building on it. On this website I will present all of what I will offer
